items.value: In <color=#FB6F37>Ruinarch</color>, you are a powerful demon overlord bent on invading worlds. You cannot manifest yourself in mortal realms yet so you must exert your influence through various spells and minions.\n  Though the game's end goal is to <color=#FB6F37>wipe out the villagers</color>, it would be more fun if you approach your invasion in a more creative manner.\n  This tutorial gives you a variety of spells and abilities from  the <color=#FB6F37>three different Archetypes</color> to show you your options
